regen.absent_element: indication of when a manual setting is enacted and when it will revert to the default setting
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an indication to the user when a manual temperature setting is enacted and when it will revert to the default setting.

regen.absent_element: notification or alert when manual setting is enacted and before reverting to default setting
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or alert the user when a manual temperature setting is enacted and before it reverts to the default setting.

regen.absent_element: indication of schedule conflict or override when manual setting is enacted
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user if a manual temperature setting conflicts with a scheduled setting and provide an option to override the scheduled setting.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
